_header: Complain I may wheresoever I go
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 327.
_description: The forsaken lover — three stanzas rhyme royal

BodRawC813.First Lines:
Compleyn I may wher Soo euer I gooSythe I haue done my besye
                    peyne…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…Sythe that on hur my loue ys losteWhome of all creatures I
                    trustyde most
